input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Protective Neoprene Sleeve Cover for Dell Venue 8 / Dell Venue 8 Pro 8" Tablet

Item keywords:
Fashionable, lightweight & durable VanGoddy Neoprene Sleeve Cover
Neoprene tapestry cushions & protects your device against shock & impact
Front zipper pocket can accommodate small accessories along-side your device
Dual zipper opening allows for quick & easy access to your device & accessories

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Fashionable, lightweight & durable VanGoddy Neoprene Sleeve Cover for Dell Venue 8 / Dell Venue 8 Pro 8" Tablet. The neoprene tapestry cushions & protects your device against shock & impact. The front zipper pocket can accommodate small accessories along-side your device. The dual zipper opening allows for quick & easy access to your device & accessories. This sleeve is ideal for protecting your device while adding a touch of style to your tablet.  This is a stylish case for your Dell Venue 8 or Dell Venue 8 Pro 8" Tablet. It is made of neoprene and features a zipper closure. The case is designed to protect your device from shock and impact. It has a dual zipper opening that allows for quick and easy access to your device and accessories. The front zipper pocket can accommodate small accessories. The neoprene tapestry is fashionable and lightweight, making it durable and easy to carry.
input_text.Response B:
Looking for a stylish and functional way to protect your Dell Venue 8 or Dell Venue 8 Pro 8" tablet? Look no further than the VanGoddy Neoprene Sleeve Cover!

This fashionable and lightweight sleeve cover is made from durable neoprene material that cushions and protects your device against shock and impact. The front zipper pocket can accommodate small accessories, and the dual zipper opening allows for quick and easy access to your device and accessories.

Whether you're looking for a basic or a more colorful option, our protective neoprene sleeve covers come in a variety of colors and patterns to suit your style. So why wait? Add a touch of personality to your tablet and protect it at the same time with the VanGoddy Neoprene Sleeve Cover.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.factors_a: Repetitive. Does not follow AIDA framework
label_annotations.factors_b: Includes phrases not included in prompt re variety of colors and patterns
label_annotations.feedback: Could not find product to verify whether there is a variety of colors and patterns available
